Posts.Content: The thing is its not about the scars and what they look like or will look like , I cant get my head around the fact that I have a belly for a breast , its the worst feeling ive had since my diagnosis in march , what to do  I have no idea.
Posts.Title: masectomy and reconstruction

Posts.Content: I know im lucky in a way to have been told that all the c has been removed when the masectomy was done. I had a mesectomy and diep reconstruction. I cant look at my top belly it makes me feel sick when I think about it. My operation was 25th june . I have been advised to talk to some one
Posts.Title: masectomy and reconstruction
